Trainer

Class VocabManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Trainer.VocabManager

  • public class VocabManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by aarim on 17.11.2016.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean askInverted
      Determines if answer and question of vocab should be switched.
      private boolean caseSense
      Determines whether or not to check case sensitive when comparing the input answer.
      private Controller controller
      An instance of the JavaFX Controller.
      private @Nullable Vocab current
      An instance of the currently selected vocab.
      private javafx.stage.Stage main
      An instance of the main Stage (needed for File Dialogs).
      private int maxTries
      Determines after how many wrong answers the next vocab should get selected.
      private int rightAmountToReset
      Determines the amount of correct answers are needed to reset a vocabs failure-rate.
      private int triesOnVoc
      An int-counter which saves the amount of wrong answers on the current selected vocab.
      private PriorityQueue<Vocab> vokabelliste
      An instance of an PriorityQueue containing Vocab.

    • Field Detail

      • controller

        private final Controller controller
        An instance of the JavaFX Controller.

      • main

        private final javafx.stage.Stage main
        An instance of the main Stage (needed for File Dialogs).

      • vokabelliste

        private final PriorityQueue<Vocab> vokabelliste
        An instance of an PriorityQueue containing Vocab. The Priority is determined by the failure-rate of the vocab.

      • current

        @Nullable
private @Nullable Vocab current
        An instance of the currently selected vocab. Should not be used in methods as it may be null. Use the getter getCurrent() instead as it does not return null.

      • caseSense

        private boolean caseSense
        Determines whether or not to check case sensitive when comparing the input answer. Controlled by the user through a CheckBox and set by this method.

      • rightAmountToReset

        private int rightAmountToReset
        Determines the amount of correct answers are needed to reset a vocabs failure-rate. Controlled by the user through a Slider and set by this method.

      • askInverted

        private boolean askInverted
        Determines if answer and question of vocab should be switched. Controlled by the user through a Slider and set by this method.

      • maxTries

        private int maxTries
        Determines after how many wrong answers the next vocab should get selected. Controlled by the user through a Slider and set by this method.

      • triesOnVoc

        private int triesOnVoc
        An int-counter which saves the amount of wrong answers on the current selected vocab.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VocabManager

        public VocabManager(Controller controller,
                    javafx.stage.Stage main)
        Constructor of VocabManager. Called by the start method in Main.
        Parameters:
        controller - The JavaFX Controller. Sets this field
        main - The main JavaFX Stage. Sets this field

    • Method Detail

      • onFinishClick

        public void onFinishClick()
        Gets called by this Method. Updates visual features in the JavaFX Controller and logs the answer on the current vocab.

      • nextVocab

        private void nextVocab()
        Selects the next vocab. Always takes the front of the PriorityQueue unless the front is the current vocab. In that case it takes the second vocab from the front.

      • onAddClick

        public void onAddClick(java.lang.String question,
                       java.lang.String answer)
        Gets called by this Method . Adds a vocab to the PriorityQueue.
        Parameters:
        question - The question of the vocab. Will be set to this field in the new vocab.
        answer - The answer of the vocab. Will be set to this field in the new vocab..

      • onImportClick

        public void onImportClick()
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Gets called by this Method. Opens a File Opening Dialog and calls this method with the chosen file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception while reading selected file. Is thrown when file is null.

      • onExportClick

        public void onExportClick()
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Gets called by this Method. Opens a File Saving Dialog and calls this method with the chosen file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception while saving file. Is thrown when file is null.

      • onClearClick

        public void onClearClick()
        Gets called by this Method. Deletes every element of the PriorityQueue .

      • importVocab

        private void importVocab(@NotNull
                         @NotNull java.io.File saveFile)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Parses String read from file and adds parsed vocabs to the PriorityQueue .
        Parameters:
        saveFile - File that gets read to String. Should contain only one line with the following format: #$question;$answer;$amountAnsweredRight$amountAnsweredWrong;$priority;# replace $... with the fields from Vocab
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception while reading file. Is thrown when file is null

      • getAllVocabAsString

        @NotNull
private @NotNull java.lang.String getAllVocabAsString()
        Formats all vocabs in the PriorityQueue to a String. Parses to the following format: #$question;$answer;$amountAnsweredRight$amountAnsweredWrong;$priority;# replace $... with the fields from Vocab
        Returns:
        the formatted String containing data from all Vocabs

      • exportVocab

        private void exportVocab(@NotNull
                         @NotNull java.io.File savefile)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Appends a file with the String of all vocab returned by this method.
        Parameters:
        savefile - The file to append
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception while writing to the file. Is thrown when the file is null

      • isRight

        private boolean isRight()
        Checks if the current vocab is rightfully answered. Compensates for case sensivity.
        Returns:
        if the vocab should be considered rightfully answered

      • getCurrent

        @NotNull
private @NotNull Vocab getCurrent()
        Getter method which provides a vocab instance which is never null (unlike the current field).
        Returns:
        instance of vocab: Normally current if it is not null

      • getFormattedCorrection

        @NotNull
private @NotNull javafx.scene.text.Text[] getFormattedCorrection(@NotNull
                                                                           @NotNull java.lang.String answerProvided)
        Getter method which generates a formatted Text[] which contains the provided answer as char[] colored red or green dependent whether or not the char matches with the correct answer.
        Parameters:
        answerProvided - the input which should be compared to the correct answer
        Returns:
        Text[] with Text all containing only one red/green colored char

      • updateSettings

        public void updateSettings(int maxTries,
                           boolean askInverted,
                           boolean caseSense,
                           int rightAmountToReset)
        Gets called by this method and applies settings by changing fields. Also invokes nextVocab() to compensate for changes.
        Parameters:
        maxTries - new Value of maxTries
        askInverted - new Value of askInverted
        caseSense - new Value of caseSense
        rightAmountToReset - new Value of rightAmountToReset

      • isReady

        public boolean isReady()
        Is called to make sure a vocab is available and is ready.
        Returns:
        whether or not questioning is ready to start
